309129.「ふふ……あなたと こうして\n ゆっくり 過ごすことができて\n とても うれ:
I'm so happy to be able to spend time with you
like this.

309130.「時間があるときに 話してあげたかったの。\n あなたの 生まれたときのこと……:
I wanted to tell you when I have time. I
wanted to tell you about your birth...

309131.「あの日は 私たち夫婦にとって\n 人生で 最良の日になった……。: That day was the best day of our lives.

309132.「よく 頑張ってくれたな マローネ！\n これが 俺たちの子か……。: You did a great job, Marone!

309133.「さあ あなた。\n この子を 抱いてあげてください。: Come on, you. Hold this child in your arms.

309135.「まだ 首がすわっていないから\n しっかりと 支えてあげてくださいね。:
He's not fully developed his neck yet, so
you'll have to support him well.

309137.「あの人ったら ちいさい あなたを\n 抱っこするのに ずっと\n おどおどしっ:
He was always so frightened when I held you in
my arms...

309138.「おかしいでしょう？ エテーネ王国でも\n 指折りの剣士であるあの人が 生まれた:
Strange, isn't it? That the best swordsman in
the Ethene Kingdom would struggle against a
newborn little you.

309139.「でもね。\n そんなあの人の顔を見て\n あなたは……笑ってくれたのよ。:
But you know what? Seeing her face like that,
you... you smiled at me.

309140.「ハハッ 見てくれ マローネ！\n 俺を見て 笑ったぞ！\n 俺のことが わかる: Look at that, Marone! I can tell!

309142.「ずっと お前に会いたかった。\n 生まれてきてくれて……\n 俺たちの子になっ:
I've wanted to meet you for so long. Thank you
for being born... for being ours.

309143.「あなたは そこにいるだけで 私たちに\n たくさんの幸せを 与えてくれたの。\:
You gave us so much happiness just by being
there. Of course, it's still the same...

309144.「私たちは あなたのお父さんと\n お母さんになれて とても幸せ。\n だから:
We are so happy to be your father and mother.
So let me say these words one more time.

309145.「私たちのもとに 生まれてきてくれて\n ありがとう <pc>。\n あなたのこ:
Thank you for being born to us <pc>.
I love you with all my heart.

309146.「ふたりとも ここにいたのか。\n なんの話を していたんだ？:
You were both here. What were they talking
about?

309148.「また こうして 親子３人で過ごす日が\n 来るなど 思いもしなかったな。お前た:
I never thought that the day would come when the three of us would be able to spend time together again. I thought I would never see
you again...

309149.「キュロノスを倒すため 必要なことだと\n 覚悟してはいたが お前たちとの別れは:
I was prepared to do what was necessary to
defeat the Kyuronos, but the pain of saying
goodbye to you guys was unbearable for me...

309150.「もう二度と お前たちを\n この幸せな時を 失いたくはない……。:
I don't want to lose you guys ever again in
this happy time...

309151.「どこにもいきません……私も <pc>も。\n ずっと あなたのそばにいます。\:
I'm not going anywhere... neither am I
<pc>. I will always be with you. We
are family.

309153.「そうだわ。\n あなたの話を 聞かせてちょうだい。\n あなたの長い長い 旅の:
Yes, it is. Tell me your story. Tell me about
your long, long journey.

309154.<pc>は マローネとパドレに\nこれまでの長い長い旅路の話を\n語って 聞かせ:
<pc> told Marone and Padre the story
of his long, long journey so far...

309155.ふたりは ほほえみながら\n<pc>の話に 耳を傾け\n親子の時間は 過ぎていっ:
They listened to <pc>'s story with
smiles on their faces, and the time between
parent and child passed...

309157.こうして エテーネ王国の \nお披露目式が 始まった。:
Thus began the unveiling ceremony of Ethene
Kingdom.

309158.メレアーデは 国の代表として\n各国からの賓客を 立派にもてなし……:
Mereade, as a representative of his country,
entertained guests from all over the world in
fine style...

309159.客人たちは ５０００年の時を超えて 現れた\nアストルティアの 新たな仲間……\:
The guests were delighted to welcome the new
companion of Astoltia...the Ethene Kingdom,
which had emerged from beyond 5,000 years.

309160.式典は とどこおりなく 進行し\nメレアーデの演説によって\n締めくくられようと:
The ceremony proceeded without a hitch and was
about to conclude with a speech by Mereade...

309161.「各国より お越しの皆さま。私たちの暮らす\n エテーネ王国を アストルティアの:
Dear guests from all over the world, thank you very much for welcoming us to Ethene Kingdom as part of Astoltia. Thank you very much for
welcoming us to Ethene Kingdom as a member of Astoltia.

309162.「私たちが 共に手を取り合い 歩む未来が\n 輝かしいもので ありますように！\:
May our future be glorious as we walk hand in
hand! Glory to Astoltia, our homeland!

309164.「どうだった？ ちゃんとできてたかしら？\n 私 緊張しちゃって……:
How did I do? Did I do it right? I was so
nervous.

309165.「どうしたの？\n 何か 探してるみたいだけど……。:
What's wrong? You seem to be looking for
something...

309168.「何を言ってるんだ。お前の母親は\n マローネなんて名前じゃないし お前を産んで:
What are you talking about? Your mother wasn't
named Marone and she died shortly after giving
birth to you.

309169.「ねぇ 顔色が悪いわ。だいじょうぶ……？: Hey, you don't look so good. Are you okay...?

309170.「メレアーデ様 パドレ様\n 少々 よろしいでしょうか？:
Mr. Mereade, Mr. Padre, may I have your
attention, please?

309171.「あっ ええ！ すぐに 行きます。: Oh, yeah! I'll be right there.

309172.「慌ただしくて ごめんなさい <pc>。\n ちゃんと お礼も言いたいし\n あ:
Sorry for the rush <pc>. Please come
to the commander's office later to thank me
properly.

309173.「……ほう。\n そなたは 気づいたようだな。: Well... You seem to have noticed.

309174.「今 そなたの目の前で\n 起こったことは 夢まぼろしではない。\n すべて 現:
What has just happened before your eyes is not
a dream. It is all real.

309175.「そなたの母の存在は この世からも\n 人々の記憶からも 跡形もなく 消え失せた:
Your mother's existence has vanished from this
world and from people's memories without a
trace.

309176.「この場にいた 他の者は\n 誰も 気づいてすらおらん。\n 認識できたのは そ:
No one else present was even aware of it. Only
you and I were able to recognize it.

309177.「これは 前ぶれにすぎぬ。\n いずれは アストルティアのすべてが……:
This is only a prelude. Eventually, all of
Astoltia will be...

309178.「この『創失』によって 失われるであろう。: It will be lost through this "unmaking".

309179.「まったく 要領を得ぬ……といった顔だな。\n まぁ 今は わからずともよい。:
You look like you have no idea what's going
on. Well, you don't need to know that right
now.

309180.「母を救いたければ 先の戦いで\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残していった\n 遺物を:
If you want to save your mother, you must
examine the artifacts left behind by Dia Kut
telecrystal in the last battle.

309181.「この磁光石が カギとなるだろう。\n 持っていくがよい。:
This Magnetic Light Stone will be the key.
Take it with you.

309183.「……オーガの王が そなたを導くだろう。\n 未知の大地に すべての答えがある。:
The King of Ogre will guide you. In the land
of the unknown lies the answer to everything.
Go, to save Astoltia.

309185.「……そなたの働き 期待しているぞ。\n <pc>。:
...I'm counting on you to do your part.
<pc>.

309186.謎の少女は 姿を消してしまった……。\nひとまず 軍団長室にいる\nメレアーデの:
The mysterious girl has disappeared... Let's
head for Mereade at the commander's office for
now.

309188.「ご足労いただき 申し訳ありません。\n この調査には あなたの協力が\n 不可:
I apologize for the inconvenience. I feel your
cooperation is essential to this
investigation.

309189.「……おや？ どうして\n 私が オーグリード大陸にいるのか\n 不思議に 思わ: ...Oh? You are wondering why I am in Ogreed.

309190.「バドリー岩石地帯に現れた 塔と同じく\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残したとされる\:
Like the tower that appeared in the Budley
Rock Zone, this relic is believed to have been
left behind by Dia Kut telecrystal.

309191.「もともと ガートラント王国だけで\n 調査をおこなっていたそうなのですが\n:
Originally, the Gartlant Kingdom alone was supposed to have conducted the survey, but due to a lack of specialists, it proved
difficult...

309192.「そこで アストルティアで\n 最先端の技術力を有する ドルワーム研究院の\n:
That is why I, the head of the Dolworm Institute, the most technologically advanced institute in Astoltia, was invited to
participate in this project.

309193.「これは ジア・クト念晶体が使用していた\n なんらかの装置だと 推測されますが:
We assume that this is some kind of device
used by Dia Kut telecrystal, but we do not
know exactly what it is...

309194.「彼らは 我々をはるかに 超越する\n 技術力を持った 生命体だったようですね。:
They seem to have been life forms with
technological capabilities far beyond our own.

309195.「いろいろと 試してみてはいるのですが\n 肝心の動力源が 切れているようで\n:
We have tried everything, but it seems that
the key power source has been cut off and we
can't even get the device to start.

309196.「ジア・クト念晶体と戦った あなたであれば\n この装置が何か 見当がつくのでは:
I called you here because I thought you might
have an idea what this device is, since you
fought Dia Kut telecrystal.

309197.「おっと。ここで 私が\n 長々と説明しても しかたがありませんね。\n さあ:
Oops. There's no point in me going on at
length here. Now, please take a closer look at
the device.

309199.磁光石を 装置のくぼみに はめてみますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to fit the Magnetic Light Stone
into the hollow of the device?<yesno><close>

309200.「石に 装置が反応している……？\n それを 装置のくぼみに\n はめてみてくれ:
The device is reacting to the stone...? Could
you try to fit it in the hollow of the device?

309201.<pc>は 装置のくぼみに\n謎の少女からもらった 磁光石を\nはめてみた！:
<pc> put the Magnetic Light Stone
given to him by the mysterious girl in the
hollow of the device!

309203.「ふむ……今ある情報だけでは\n ここが アストルティアのどこか\n 特定するの:
Hmmm...it seems difficult to determine where
in Astoltia we are with the information we
have.

309204.「他に 何か\n 手がかりに なりそうなものが\n 見つかればいいのですが……。:
I wish I could find something else that might
help...

309206.「うわッ！？\n な なんなんだ コイツは！？: What the hell? What the hell is this guy?

309208.「今の魔物……私の記憶が 正しければ\n アストルティアで 確認されていないもの:
The current monster... if I remember
correctly, it is not confirmed in Astoltia.
Maybe a new species...?

309209.「……え！？\n この星の配列は……まさか あり得ない！:
What? This arrangement of stars...no way. It
can't be!

309210.「いや でも しかし……。\n ひょっとすると さっきの魔物も？\n すごいぞ:
No, but... By any chance, the monster from
earlier? That's amazing. Oh, my God!

309211.「<pc>さん。\n お 落ちついて 聞いてくださいね。:
<pc>. Please calm down and listen to
me.

309212.「先ほど 我々の前に現れた魔物は\n アストルティアで 確認されていないものです:
The monster that just appeared in front of us is one that has not been confirmed in Astoltia. At first I thought it was just a new
species.

309213.「ですが ここの天体を視認したところ\n 我々の知る それとは 似ても似つかない:
However, when we looked at the objects here, they have an observationally improbable alignment that bears no resemblance to
anything we know of.

309214.「自分で言っていても 信じがたい話ですが\n これらの事象から 導き出される答え:
It's hard to believe, even if I said it
myself, but there is only one answer that can
be drawn from these events...

309215.「私たちは アストルティアではない\n 未知の世界に 来てしまったのですッッ！:
We have come to an unknown world that is not
Astoltia!

309216.「……コホン。ともかく これは\n 歴史に残る 重大な発見と言えるでしょう。\n:
Anyway, this is a significant discovery that
will go down in history. I would like to start
the investigation immediately...

309217.「先ほど 現れたものの他にも\n 危険な魔物が 生息している可能性は\n 否定で:
We cannot deny the possibility that there are
other dangerous monsters in addition to the
ones that just appeared.

309218.「いったん アストルティアに戻って\n ガートラント城にいらっしゃる グロスナー:
I will have to return to Astoltia and report
this to King Grossner at Gartlant Castle.

309219.「調べたところ この装置は 遺跡にあったものと\n 対になっていて 問題なく使用:
We have examined the device, and it seems to be a pair with the one we found at the site, and it should work fine. Let's use it to
return to Astoltia.

309220.「では あの装置は ジア・クト念晶体が\n 使用していた 転送装置で\n 未知な:
So you think that device is the transporter
used by Dia Kut telecrystal and that it is
connected to the unknown?

309221.「だとすると その世界は ジア・クト念晶体が\n 支配する 危険な地では あるま:
If so, that world must be a dangerous place
ruled by Dia Kut telecrystal. And you have
confirmed the presence of crystals, right?

309222.「おそれながら もし そうであれば\n 周囲に ジア・クト念晶体の\n 拠点なり:
Fear not, if that were the case, it would be
natural to have a Dia Kut telecrystal base or
something in the vicinity.

309223.「かの地を ジア・クト念晶体が\n 支配する領土だと断ずるのは 早計に思います。:
It would be premature to declare that Dia Kut
telecrystal is in control of this land. We
should explore it to be sure.

309224.「生態系や天体だけではない……\n あの地には アストルティアに存在しない\n:
It's not just ecosystems and celestial bodies... there are many other possibilities lying dormant in that place that don't exist
in Astoltia.

309225.「ただちに 大規模な調査隊を結成し\n 未知の大地の 調査に向かうべきだと\n:
I believe that a large survey team should be
formed immediately to explore the unknown!

309226.「あの世界の存在は 必ずや\n アストルティアの発展において\n 有益なものとな:
The existence of that world will certainly be
beneficial to the development of Astoltia!
Because...

309227.「まあ 待て。ドゥラ院長。: Well, wait a minute, Director Dura.

309228.「そなたの考えも 理解できる。\n しかし ジア・クトのことを抜きにしても\n:
I understand your point of view. But even
without Dia Kut, we don't know what kind of
danger we are in.

309229.「ガートラントの王として 我が国の兵の命を\n いたずらに 危険にさらすわけには:
As King of Gartland, I will not unnecessarily
endanger the lives of my soldiers. And of
course, your lives as well.

309231.「ふむ……。\n そなたはどう思う <pc>。\n 未知の大地へ 向かうべきだと:
Hmmm... What do you think <pc>. Do
you think we should head for the land of the
unknown?

309232.「母を救いたければ 先の戦いで\n ジア・クト念晶体が 残していった\n 遺物を:
If you want to save your mother, you must
examine the artifacts left behind by Dia Kut
telecrystal in the last battle.

309233.「……オーガの王が そなたを導くだろう。\n 未知の大地に すべての答えがある。:
The King of Ogre will guide you. In the land
of the unknown lies the answer to everything.
Go, to save Astoltia.

309234.「どうした？\n 何か 言いたいことがあるのか？<yesno><close>:
What's the matter? You got something you want
to say?<yesno><close>

309235.「遠慮はするな。\n そなたの 本心を聞かせてほしい。\n 何か 言いたいことが:
Don't be shy. I want to hear your true
feelings. Is there something you want to say?<yesno><close>

309236.「大切な者を救うため 自分は 未知の大地へ\n 旅立たなければならない……そう:
In order to save the ones I love, I must
travel to an unknown land...is that what you
say? There seems to be a deeper reason.

309237.「わかった！ これまで アストルティアのため\n 尽くしてくれた そなたの望みを:
I understand! You have done so much for
Astoltia, and I will not ignore your wishes.
We will cooperate with you!

309238.「ただちに ドルワーム王国と協力して\n アストルティア中から 有志を募り\n:
Immediately, in cooperation with Dolworm Kingdom, we will recruit volunteers from all over Astoltia and form a survey team to
explore other worlds.

309239.「そして <pc>を その調査隊の隊長。\n ドゥラ院長を 特別技術顧問に\n:
And I appoint <pc> as the head of
the survey team and Director Dura as the
special technical advisor. Will you accept?

309240.「ありがとうございます グロスナー王！\n 急ぎ ドルワームに戻り ウラード国王:
Thank you King Grossner! I will hurry back to
Dolworm and report this to King Woolard!

309241.「さあ これから 忙しくなりますよっ！\n よろしくお願いしますね <pc>隊長:
Now we are going to be busy from now on! I
look forward to working with you Captain
<pc>!

309242.こうして ガートラント王国が中心となり\nアストルティア全体を巻きこむ\n一大プ:
Thus began the great project, which was led by
the Kingdom of Gartlant and involved the whole
of Astoltia.

309243.<pc>は ドゥラ院長と共に\nグロスナー王のもとで 未知の世界の調査の\n準備:
<pc> worked with Director Dura to
prepare for the investigation of the unknown
world under King Grossner. And...

309244.「<pc>。\n そなたや ドゥラ院長の協力のおかげで\n 調査の準備は 順調に:
<pc>. Thanks to the cooperation of
you and Director Dura, preparations for the
investigation are progressing smoothly.

309245.「ドゥラ院長が 主導して おこなっていた\n 調査隊のメンバー選出も 完了した。:
Director Dura has taken the lead in selecting
the members for the survey team. All of them
are quite outstanding.

309246.「その中のひとりは そなたが よく知る人物……\n グランゼドーラ王国の 勇者姫:
One of them is someone you know well, the Hero
Princess Anlucia of the Gran Zedora Kingdom.

309247.「実力 人柄ともに 調査隊の一員として\n これほどまでに ふさわしい者は\n:
I can think of no one more qualified to be a
member of the survey team, both in terms of
ability and personality.

309248.「しかし……我が国を訪れるという\n 約束の期日は とうに過ぎておるのに\n い:
But... the promised date for his visit to our
country has already passed, and no matter how
long we wait, he has not shown up.

309249.「あの勇者姫が 約束を違えるとは 信じがたい。\n もしかすると グランゼドーラ:
It is hard to believe that the hero princess
would make a mistake. Maybe something went
wrong at Gran Zedora.

309250.「すまぬが グランゼドーラ城まで\n アンルシア姫を 迎えにいってほしい。\n:
I am sorry, but I need you to pick up Princess
Anlucia at Gran Zedora Castle. Thank you very
much.

309252.「なるほど グロスナー王の使いで 来たのだな。\n 王には 本当に 申し訳ないこ:
I see that you came on behalf of King Grossner. I'm truly sorry about the king. It was an emergency and we were not prepared for
it.

309253.「調査隊への参加を 承諾する連絡をしてすぐ\n 突然 倒れてな。\n それ以来:
I collapsed suddenly right after I contacted
him to agree to join the survey team. I have
been asleep ever since.

309254.「安心しろ アンルシアは眠っているだけだ。\n 身体に 異常はない。:
Rest assured, Anlucia is only sleeping. There
is nothing wrong with her body.

309255.「いろいろと 手を尽くしたのだが\n いっこうに 目を覚まさん。\n まるで 何:
I've tried everything, but it won't wake up.
It's as if it's rejecting something.

309256.「ただの呪いや 病気のたぐいとは思えぬ\n 異常事態だが こんな時 頼りになるは:
It is an anomaly that cannot be considered a mere curse or illness, but in times like these, even Lord Shion, who is supposed to be
reliable, has suddenly disappeared.

309257.「このグランゼドーラに\n いったい 何が起こっているのか……。: What on earth is going on at Gran Zedora?

309258.「アンルシアの 眠りを解く方法は\n 私のほうで 探しておく。\n 何かわかった:
I'll find a way to break Anlucia out of her
slumber. I'll let you know when I find out
something.

309259.「すまないが アンルシアは\n 今回の旅に 同行はできない。\n グロスナー王に:
Sorry Anlucia cannot accompany you on this
trip, please give my regards to King Grossner.

309260.「おかえりなさい 隊長。\n おや？ アンルシア姫を\n 迎えにいったはずでは…:
Welcome back, Cap. Hmm? I thought you went to
pick up Princess Anlucia...?

309261.「アンルシア姫は おいでにならないと……。\n ずっと 眠ったまま 目を覚まさな:
Princess Anlucia must be here... I'm worried
that she's been asleep and won't wake up...

309262.「おっと そうだ。たった今\n 他の調査隊のメンバーが そろったところです。\n:
Oops, that's right. The other members of the
survey team have just arrived. Everyone, let's
say hello to the captain!

309263.「よっ ひさしぶり。\n 実入りの良さそうな 仕事だったんでな。\n 調査隊とや:
Hey, long time no see. I've got a good paying
job. I'm going to go with the survey team.

309264.「……ジーガンフだ。\n マリーンの事件のときは 世話になった。: Jiganf, who helped me with the Malynn case.

309265.「ジーガンフは オーガの猛者たちが住む\n ランガーオ村の 武闘大会チャンピオン:
Jiganf is the champion of the Langao Village
martial arts tournament, home to the fiercest
Ogre warriors. I can vouch for his ability.

309266.「へへっ 俺は かわいい甥っ子……\n ラグアスに頼まれて 参加したってわけさ。:
I was asked by my nephew Raguas to participate
in this event. He asked me to see the faraway
world on his behalf.

309267.「おっと こう見えて 俺はウデも立つし\n 見知らぬ土地に行くのに サーカスの芸:
Well, you see, I'm pretty good at what I do, and I'm pretty sure that circus tricks will come in handy when I'm in a strange land, huh?
You can count on it!

309268.「おひさしぶりです <pc>さん。\n また 共に 冒険できるなんて 夢のようで:
It's been a long time <pc>. It's
like a dream come true to have another
adventure with you.

309269.「やあ 大魔お……おっと ここでは \n 隊長と呼んだほうが 良さそうかな。\n:
Hey Daima-o...oops, I guess I should call you
Captain here. ...Oh, never mind about my
appearance.

309270.「個人的に アストルティアの近況を調べていたら\n 君が隊長となって 冒険の旅に:
I was personally checking up on what's going on in Astoltia when I heard that you're going on an adventure as captain. I couldn't stay
away, so I came here!

309271.「……お披露目式では <pc>の言うことを\n 信じてあげられなくて ごめんなさ:
...I'm sorry I didn't believe you
<pc> at the unveiling ceremony. I
behaved badly...

309272.「パドレ叔父様も 同じ気持ちよ。\n 私の想いを伝えたら 私が不在の間\n 国を:
Uncle Padre feels the same way. I told him how
I felt and he promised to support the country
in my absence.

309273.「私は あなたの言うことを 信じるわ。\n マローネさんを 捜すのに\n 私も:
I believe you, and I would like to accompany
you in your search for Ms. Marone!

309274.「以上が 異世界探索の調査隊メンバーです。\n アンルシア姫がいないのは 残念で:
These are the members of the research team for the otherworldly exploration, although it is unfortunate that Princess Anlucia is not with
us.

309275.「お話中のところ 失礼いたします！\n 調査隊の 入隊希望者という者が\n 来て:
Excuse me for interrupting! There's someone
here who wants to join the survey team...

309276.「入隊希望者？\n 募集は とうに締め切ったはずでしょう。:
Prospective enlistees? The recruitment process
should have been closed by now.

309277.「……ええええええ～！？\n 締め切りなんて 聞いてないよう！\n ねえねえ な:
What... eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! I didn't hear anything about a deadline! Hey, hey,
can't you do something about it?

309278.「なんとかと言われても 決まりですので……。\n 調査隊のメンバーは もう定員で:
I'm sorry, but it's decided... The survey team
is already at capacity. I'm sorry, but please
withdraw.

309279.「そんなぁ どうしよう……。\n お師匠様に 怒られちゃうよ……。\n あっ！:
Oh no, what should I do... Master will be
angry with me... Ah..!

309280.「ねぇねぇ！\n もしかして キミ……<pc>？\n わぁ お師匠様の言ってた通:
Hey, hey! Could it be you...<pc>?
Wow, just as Master said!

309281.「はじめまして！ あたし ポルテ！\n 調査隊に入って <pc>を 助けるように:
Nice to meet you! My master told me to join
the research team and help <pc>.

309282.「……んん？ どうしたの～？\n あたしのこと じーっと見て。\n あたしの顔に:
...hmm? What's wrong~? Stare at me. Is there
something on my face?
<select_nc>
Did you meet at the unveiling ceremony?
Twin sisters?
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

309283.「お披露目式？ なんのこと～？\n キミとは はじめましてだよ。: Unveiling ceremony? It's nice to meet you.

309284.「双子？ なんのこと～？\n あたしは ひとりっ子だよ。:
Twins? What are you talking about? I'm an only
child.

309285.「……おい 嬢ちゃん。オレたちが向かうのは\n 未知の生物が住む 危険な異世界だ:
Hey, girl. We're heading to a dangerous alien
world populated by unknown creatures, and
you're only going to slow us down.

309286.「むぅ～ バカにしないでよっ！\n お師匠様ほどじゃないけど あたし 特別な術が:
Don't make fun of me! I'm not as good as
Master, but I can use a special technique. I'm
sure it'll come in handy!

309289.「すごい！ お花が 咲いたわ！: Oh, my gosh! The flowers have bloomed!

309290.「植物に 生命力を与え 成長させたのか。\n ヴェリナード王家の歌に 通じる……:
It's an interesting technique that is
reminiscent of...or perhaps different
from...the Verinard Song of Kings.

309291.「ねっ ねっ！ すごいでしょっ？\n だから あたしを 調査隊に……:
Hey, hey! Isn't it amazing? That's why I'm on
the survey team.

309292.「でも 植物を成長させるだけでしょう？\n たしかに めずらしい技術ではあります:
But it only makes plants grow, right? It is
true that this is a rare technology...

309293.「<pc> お願い！ あたし どーしても\n いっしょに 行かなくちゃいけないの:
<pc> Please! I have to go with you no
matter what! Please let me join the survey
team!<yesno><close>

309294.「そんなぁ！ あたし ぜーったい\n <pc>の役に 立ってみせるから！\n だ:
I don't think so! I'll definitely stand up for
<pc>! So, please! Please let me join
the survey team!<yesno><close>

309295.「わぁっ！ やったやった！ ありがと～！\n あたし 精一杯 がんばるからっ。\:
Wow! I did it, I did it! Thanks~! I'll do my
best. I'll do my best!

309296.「まぁ 隊長が そう言うなら……。\n 何かの役に 立つかもしれませんし\n あ:
Well, if the captain says so... I may be of
some use to you, so I'll allow you to enlist.

309297.「さて これで 調査隊がそろいました。\n バカンウグレ遺跡の転送装置を使い\n:
Now that the survey team is assembled, let's
use the transporter at Bakanugure Ruins to
travel to another world.

309298.「いよいよ 出発か……。\n かーっ なんだか 緊張しちまうなぁ！: Finally, we're leaving... I'm so nervous!

309299.「この遺跡は 古代オルセコの\n 時代のものだそうだよ。並べられてる像には\n:
These ruins are said to be from the ancient
Orseco period. The statues in the rows have a
religious significance.

309300.「……おい アンタら。\n 遠足じゃねえんだぞ。\n あんま はしゃいでんじゃね:
Hey, you guys. This is not a field trip. Don't
get too excited.

309301.「こちらで出発前の 最終確認をしておりますので\n みなさん もう少々 お待ちく:
We are making final checks before departure,
so please wait a little longer!

309304.「消え……ちゃった。今の見たよね？\n お師匠様の言ってた通りだ。\n これが:
It's gone...gone. You saw that, right? Just
like the master said. This is unmaking...

309305.「……気づいているのは あたしたちだけ。\n みんな 像があったことすら\n 覚:
We were the only ones who noticed. I don't
think people even remember that there was a
statue.

309306.「創失は アストルティアに 降りかかった呪い。\n 創生のチカラを 奪われちゃう:
Unmaking is a curse that has befallen
Astoltia. The power of creation is taken away.

309307.「創失の呪いは すべての存在を食いつぶす。\n このままいくと アストルティア\:
The curse of unmaking eats away at all
existence. If this continues, Astoltia itself
will disappear...

309308.「アンルシア姫が 眠ってしまったのも\n 創失に 関係があるのかも……。:
Maybe it has something to do with unmaking
Princess Anlucia fall asleep...

309309.「お師匠様が 言ってた。\n これから向かう 未知の世界には\n 創失の呪いを解:
Master said. There are clues to break the
curse of unmaking in the unknown world we are
about to enter.

309310.「アストルティアを\n 救えるのは あたしたちだけ。\n なんとしても その手が:
We are the only ones who can save Astoltia. We
have to find that clue, no matter what it
takes.

309311.「お待たせしました！\n 準備が完了しましたので みなさん\n 装置のそばに 集:
Thank you for your patience! Now that
everything is ready, please gather around the
device!

309312.「行こう <pc>！\n キミのお母さんを 助けるためにも！:
Let's go <pc>!!! to help you're
mother!

309313.「それでは これより\n 探索拠点の設営を 開始します！: We will now begin setting up the search base!

309315.「みなさん ご協力 ありがとうございます！\n 調査拠点……では少々 味気ないで:
Thank you for your cooperation! A research
base...is a bit tasteless, isn't it?

309316.「この拠点を 私たちの冒険の始まる場所……\n はじまりの地と 名付けたいと思い:
I would like to name this base where our
adventure begins...Land of Beginnings!

309317.「それでは これからの調査計画について\n お話しさせていただきましょう。:
Now let me tell you about our future research
plans.

309318.「拠点設営の際 撤去した結晶がふさいでいた先を\n 見回ったところ このはじまり:
We looked around at the area blocked by the crystals that had been removed when we set up our base, and discovered that the Land of
Beginnings is surrounded by a vast plain.

309319.「さらに この平野から 東西南北へ\n 続く道が 発見されたのです。:
Furthermore, a path leading east, west, north,
south, and west from this plain was
discovered.

309320.「皆さんには 二人一組で チームを組み\n 平野の先の調査へ \n それぞれ 向:
I would like each of you to form a team of two
and head out to investigate what lies beyond
the plains.

309321.「僭越ながら バランスを考え\n 事前に 私のほうで チーム割りを\n させてい:
With your permission, I have made the team
assignments before the event for the sake of
balance.

309322.「まず……メレアーデ王女と ジーガンフ殿。\n おふたりには 南の地の 調査をお:
First of all, Princess Mereade and Mister
Jiganf. I'd like you two to investigate the
south.

309323.「ふふっ 了解しましたっ。\n よろしくね ジーガンフさん！: I got it. Nice to meet you, Jiganf!

309324.「ヒューザ殿と アスバル殿は\n 北を お願いします。: Hyuza and Asbal, please take the north.

309325.「ナブレット殿と エステラ殿には\n 東に 向かっていただきましょう。:
I would like to ask Ms. Nablette and Ms.
Estella to turn to the east.

309326.「そして……残る西の地は\n <pc>隊長と ポルテ殿\n ふたりに 行っていた:
And...the rest of the west will go to
Captain <pc> and Mister Porte.

309327.「わーい！\n キミと いっしょに行けるなんて うれしい！\n よろしくね 隊長:
I'm so happy to be able to go with you! Nice
to meet you, Cap!

309328.「各地で 何が待ち受けているか\n わかりません。充分な備えをしてから\n 調査:
You never know what awaits you in each
location. Please be well prepared before
heading out to investigate.

309329.「それでは最後に……<pc>隊長。\n 調査に向かう隊員たちに ひと言\n 激励:
And finally...Captain <pc>. Please
give a word of encouragement to the members of
the team as they head out to investigate.

309330.隊員たちに 何と言いますか？\n<select_nc>\nガンガンいこうぜ\nい:
What would you say to your men?
<select_nc>
Let's go for it!
Let's do all kinds of things!
Cherish your life
<select_end>
<case 1>
<close>
<case 2>
<close>
<case 3>
<close>
<case_cancel>
<close>
<case_end>

309331.「ああ 新種の魔物が 現れようが\n 全部 オレが ぶった斬ってやる。\n 大船:
Yeah, a new kind of monster may appear, but
I'm going to smash them all. Just stay with me
like you're on a big boat.

309332.「うん。様々な側面から\n 物事を見ることは 大切だ。\n この調査を 実のある:
Yes, it is important to see things from different sides. It is important to look at things from different aspects. Let's make this
survey fruitful.

309333.「ええ 安全第一で参りましょう。\n 皆さんの無事が 最優先です。:
Yes, let's be safe. Everyone's safety is our
top priority.

309334.「私は ここに残り みなさんからの\n 調査報告を お待ちしております。\n く:
I will stay here and await your investigative
reports. Take care!

309335.調査隊の隊員たちは\nそれぞれ 調査に向かった。\nポルテと共に 平野の西へ向か:
Each member of the survey team headed out to
investigate, and we'll head west across the
plain with Porte.

309337.「うーん……。\n 何か 封印がされているみたい。\n このままじゃ 先に進めな:
Hmmm... It looks like something is sealed up.
I can't go on like this...

309340.「わたくしは 女神ゼネシア……。\n この世界 果ての大地ゼニアスを\n 守護す:
I am Goddess Zenethia. I am the one who
protects this world Zeniath...

309341.「あなたがたは……\n ゼニアスの住人では ありませんね？: You are not residents of Zeniath, are you?

309342.「えっと……はじめまして 女神さま！\n あたしは ポルテ。こっちは\n 燈火の:
Well...nice to meet you, Goddess! I'm Porte.
This is Captain <pc> of the Light
Investigation Team!

309343.「あたしたち アストルティアという世界から\n ジア・クト念晶体っていうヤツらが:
We came to this world from the world of
Astoltia using a device left behind by a group
called Dia Kut telecrystal.

309344.「アストルティアは 今\n 創失の呪いに むしばまれていて……\n それを 解く:
Astoltia is now under the spell of unmaking
and is looking for a way to break it.

309345.「それで あたしたち\n この扉の先に 進みたくて……。\n そのぉ……なんとか:
So we wanted to go beyond this door... Can't
you do something about that?

309346.「扉の先は いわば禁足地……。\n この世界の秘密が 眠る場所……。:
Beyond the door, so to speak, is a forbidden
place... A place where the secrets of this
world sleep...

309347.「あなたがたが 求めるものは\n そこで 見つけられることでしょう。: You will find what you are looking for there.

309348.「この世界の神として わたくしも\n あなたがたの チカラになって\n さしあげ:
As a god of this world, I wish I could be of
help to you.

309349.「いにしえの戦いにより\n わたくしは チカラを封じられており\n 動くことが:
I have been powerless to move due to an
ancient battle...

309351.「ですが 方法はあります。\n この世界で 星のオーラを 探すのです。:
But there is a way. We can look for
Benevolessence in this world.

309352.「南 北 東の地に おもむき\n そこで暮らす人々を 助けることで\n 星のオー:
By going to the South, North, and East and
helping the people there, we will have
Benevolessence.

309353.「この星封の結晶を\n あなたがたに 授けましょう。: Let me bestow upon you this Star Seal Crystal.

309355.「星封の結晶に 星のオーラを満たすのです。\n さすれば 道は ひらけるでしょう:
Fill the Star Seal Crystal with
Benevolessence. Then the way will open.

309356.「また その結晶があれば\n この世界の様々な場所を 自由に\n 行き来すること:
With the crystals, we can freely travel to and
from different places in the world.

309357.「あなたがたの旅に お役立てなさい。:
I hope it will be of use to you in your
journey.

309360.「すっごく キレイな人だったねぇ。\n 女神さまと話すのなんて 初めてだから\n:
She was so beautiful. It was my first time to
talk with a goddess, so I was nervous!

309361.「星のオーラって いったい なんなんだろう？\n ゼネシアさまは この世界の人を:
What in the world is Benevolessence? Zenethia
said that you can get it by helping people in
this world...

309362.「うーん……よくわかんないから\n とりあえず はじまりの地に戻って\n 今の話:
Well...I don't know...I should go back to Land
of Beginnings and report what I just heard to
Mr. Dura.

309363.<pc>は 星封の結晶を\n使えるようになった！<me 71>: <pc> can now use Star Seal Crystal!<me 71>

309364.メインコマンドの 『どうぐ』の中にある\n『星封の結晶』を使うと アストルティア:
The "Star Seal Crystal" in the "items" section
of the main command allows you to go back and
forth between Astoltia and Zeniath.

309365.さらに ゼニアスで訪れた場所が 登録されるほか\n各地にある『星のくさび』を し:
In addition to registering the places you visit in Zeniath, you can also register them as destinations by searching for "Star Wedges"
in various locations.

309366.ゼニアスでは 屋根のある場所でも 使えます。\nまた『元の世界へ戻る』を選ぶと:
In Zeniath, you can use the roof over your head. And if you choose "Back to the World," you will return to the place most associated
with you.

309367.なお 星封の結晶の追加により\n『魂の燭台』は ルーラストーンの\nメニュー内に:
With the addition of Star Seal Crystal, Soul
Candelabra has been moved to the Zoomstone
menu.

315620.「謎に包まれし 未知なる大地に\n 火を燈せし 我ら『燈火の調査隊』！\n いざ:
We, the "Light Investigation Team", light a
fire in the unknown land wrapped in mystery!
Let's go!

318419.<pc>は そっと 部屋を後にした……。\nガートラント城の グロスナー王に\n:
<pc> quietly left the room... Let's
go report to King Grossner at Gartlant Castle.

318420.「ふふっ 君と同じチームなんて 光栄だな。: I'm honored to be on the same team as you.

318421.「おうよっ 任せときな！: Hey, I'll leave it to you!

321821.磁光石に 装置が 反応しているようだ。\n装置を よく見ると 何かを\nはめるよ:
The device seems to be reacting to the Magnetic Light Stone. If you look closely at the device, you can see a hollow that looks
like it could fit into something...

321974.ルーラストーンから 勇者姫の石を使い\nアンルシアを 迎えにいこう。:
Use the hero princess stone from Zoomstone to
pick up Anlucia.

321975.しばらくすると 燈火の調査隊の\nメンバーが到着し ドゥラ院長主導のもと\n出発:
After a while, the members of the light survey team arrived and under the leadership of Director Dura, preparations were made for
their departure...

321996.「創生のチカラっていうのは すべてのものに宿る\n 生命力みたいなもの。これが:
The power of creation is like the life force
that resides in everything. If it weakens, it
will cease to exist in this world.
